Navbars

Navbar with mobile sidebar
          
          <nav class="navbar navbar-custom mobile-sidebar navbar-fixed-top">
            <div class="container-fluid">
              <!-- Brand and toggle get grouped for better mobile display -->
              <div class="navbar-header">
                <button type="button" 
                class="collapsed btn-toggle"
                id="btn-mobile-sidebar"
                aria-expanded="false">
                  <i class="fa fa-bars"></i>
                  <i class="fa fa-times"></i>
                </button>
                <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">Web Layout Frame</a>
              </div>
              <!-- Collect the nav links, forms, and other content for toggling -->
              <div class="navbar-sidebar">
                <ul class="nav navbar-nav">
                  ..
                </ul>
                <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-right visible-xs-block">
                  ...
                </ul>
                <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-right hidden-xs">
                  ..
                </ul>
              </div>
              <!-- /.navbar-collapse -->
            </div>
            <!-- /.container-fluid -->
          </nav>
Transparent Navbar
          
          <nav class="navbar navbar-custom navbar-transparent navbar-fixed-top" id="transparent-navbar">
            <div class="container-fluid">
              <!-- Brand and toggle get grouped for better mobile display -->
              <div class="navbar-header">
                <button type="button"
                class="collapsed btn-toggle"
                data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#bs-example-navbar-collapse-1" aria-expanded="false">
                  <i class="fa fa-bars" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                  <span class="sr-only">Toggle navigation</span>
                  <span class="icon-bar"></span>
                  <span class="icon-bar"></span>
                  <span class="icon-bar"></span>
                </button>
                <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">Web Layout Frame</a>
              </div>
              <!-- Collect the nav links, forms, and other content for toggling -->
              <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="bs-example-navbar-collapse-1">
                <ul class="nav navbar-nav">
                  ..
                </ul>
              </div>
              <!-- /.navbar-collapse -->
            </div>
            <!-- /.container-fluid -->
          </nav>
Sidebar Navbar
          
          <!--Main wrapp-->
          <div id="main-wrapper" class="toggled">
            <!-- Sidebar -->
            <nav class="navbar navbar-inverse navbar-fixed-top" id="sidebar-wrapper" role="navigation">
              <ul class="nav sidebar-nav">
                <li class="sidebar-brand">
                  <a href="#">
                      Web Layout Frame
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                  <a href="#">Home</a>
                </li>
                ...
              </ul>
            </nav>
            <!--/sidebar-->
            <!--Page content-->
            <div id="page-content-wrapper">
              <!--black overlay-->
              <div class="wrapper-overlay"></div>
              <!--button toggle sidebar-->
              <button class="btn-toggle-sidebar" id="btn-toggle-sidebar">
                <i class="fa fa-bars" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                <i class="fa fa-times" aria-hidden="true"></i>
              </button>
              <!--
                Content here
              -->
            </div>
            <!--/page content-->
          </div>
          <!--/main wrapper-->
